subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: 1. The management and technical teams functional with  requisite equipment and logistics arranged for the efficient coordination of activities. 2. Training modules based on demand identified. The trainers and resource persons mobilised to ensure a systematic rollout of training programme. 3. Enhancing the number and quality of trained conflict mediators in West Africa to influence reduction in armed violence and conflict. 4. Communication, publicity, outreach and knowledge dissemination
subproject.title: KAIPTC Reg. Small arms control
